title: NixImagery.github.io
text:
This is a collection of sites and repositories I publish and maintain for work, research, or personal interests. Published sites here are related to my family tales, and the BBCâ€™s radio programme Something Understood.
I am a retired Lecturer, now doctoral student at Edinburgh University. You can find my cv here (pdf, 100kB).
This site, like many others here, is a Quarto website. To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites, or take a look at my portal at https://cullaloe.net.
